sen.j: 皇太妃(こうたいひ)とは、天皇の生母で、前天皇の妃であった人の呼称。
sen.e: Kotaihi means a person who was the biological mother of an Emperor and the wife of the previous Emperor.
Kotaihi means a person who was the biological mother of an Emperor and the wife of the previous Emperor.
Kotaihi means a person who was the biological mother of an Emperor and the wife of the previous Emperor.

sen.j: 同じく后であった人を皇太后、夫人であった人は皇太夫人と呼ばれる。
sen.e: There were similar titles called Kotaigo, the biological mother of the Emperor and dowager of previous Emperor and Kotaifujin, emperor's biological mother and consort.
There were similar titles called Kotaigo, the biological mother of the Emperor and dowager of previous Emperor and Kotaifujin, emperor's biological mother and consort.
There were similar titles called Kotaigo, the biological mother of the Emperor and dowager of previous Emperor and Kotaifujin, emperor's biological mother and consort.
